text: #AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Wednesday, Sameet Chavan, chief analyst (technical and derivatives) at Angel Broking and Sandeep Jain, director at Tradeswift Broking gave their views on Reliance Defence, Rain Industries, Tata Power and many more.
title: Buy, Sell Or Hold: Bharat Forge, Reliance Defence, Rain Industries, Tata Power? #AskBQ
